item.title: Google stopped indexing sites automatically
item.description: P.S: and other search engines. Intro This all started with with me stumbling upon an article in hackernews about google not indexing sites that are not are not added to google manually. This seemed quite odd since I remember that it took at most 3-4 days for google to pickup any sites in the past. After discussion with a couple of my friends who actually do this for a living they convinced me that the guy was just wrong and google works as expected.

item.title: Swing VPN app is a DDOS botnet
item.description: tldr: Swing VPN is using its user base to DDOS sites using its users as a an attack botnet. Introduction It all started with a friend of mine complaining that his phone was doing a request to a specific app every few seconds. Initial assumption was that the phone was infected with a virus but a 2 minute investigation showed that all requests went from ‘Swing VPN’ app which were legitimately installed on the phone as VPN service.
